rules_text:
Menace, ward–Pay 3 life
When A, Alpha’s Conscience deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token and look at the top two cards of that player’s library. Exile one of them. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled.
notes:
2.1.0: Moved A down to four mana so her vision can actually come in play before the game is about to end. Also makes treasures for the break draw.
2.2.0: Changed treasure generation to an ophidian effect
2.2.1: Changed the whole thing to an ophidian effect and gave ward pay 3 life.
